loop-count.description: Set the number of loops to execute

region.description: The regions to execute in each loop: 'sleep', 'spin', 'dgemm', 'stream', 'all2all', 'nested', 'ignore'. Append '-imbalance' to a region to apply imbalance settings.

big-o.description: Provide a problem size for reach region. It's designed such that a value of 1.0 will run on the order of one second, and run time will scale linearly with big-o

hostname.description: Specify on which hosts to apply imbalance settings

imbalance.description: Specify imbalance settings for each host (specified as a ratio)
